5RF.MU.summary: Aktieselskabet Schouw & Co. operates as an industrial conglomerate in Denmark and internationally. It operates through six segments: BioMar, Fibertex Personal Care, Fibertex Nonwovens, GPV, HydraSpecma, and Borg Automotive. The company manufactures and sells feed for the salmon, trout, sea bass and bream, and shrimp to the shrimp and fish farming industry; spunbond/spunmelt nonwovens for the personal care industry; and non-woven textiles used for various industrial applications, including for cars, construction, and filtration solutions. It also manufactures and trades in hydraulic components and systems for industry and the aftermarket; remanufactured automotive parts for the automotive industry; and manufactures technical electronics, mechanics, cable harnessing, and mechatronics. The company was founded in 1878 and is headquartered in Aarhus, Denmark.

In addition, it offers delivery, inventory management, product processing, support and guidance, and digital services. SanistÃ¥l A/S was founded in 1853 and is headquartered in Aalborg, Denmark.
